text: Nde wari wo sios gari gumgir pani ga ndɨkndɨgɨri. Mbe fhum Fhe Bakɨme buni bun nde suaŋgi. Nde mbe ruigi ruru tɨvi ga ndɨkndɨgɨp, mbe gumgi gu mbigir kurkuragi tɨvir vhuuiŋ ga ndɨkndɨgɨp, nde vhɨra mbe guigira Zisas khothɨgap, ana tɨvi zɨn vov kav, vhɨzgi ne ndɨkndɨgɨri. Nde vhɨra mbe guigira Zisas khothɨgi tɨvi zɨn ŋgɨri.
